en.title: Professional Network Marketing Course (Bahasa Language) 14th-15th March 2009.
en.content: FE recently organized a 2 Days Professional Network Marketing Course (Bahasa Language) on the 14th-15th March 2009 at the Empress Hotel, Sepang, Kuala Lumpur. The course was attended by more than 80 enthusiastic leaders who were all given Certificates from Open University Malaysia upon completion of the course. Conducting the course was FE's dynamic Presidential Director Dr Mohd Fadil and acclaimed trainer Dr BN Edwards who specializes in Motivational Sales Training and Field Leadership programs for organizations. Dr Edwards is also the author of the acclaimed book on direct selling "Recipes For Success in Network Marketing". He has also written eight other books on networking.
